scripts.build: vd-dev build && node ./generate-themes && npm run build:css
scripts.postbuild:css: npm run copy:light && npm run copy:dark && ls -l dist/*.css
scripts.copy:light: ncp dist/$(ls dist | grep tiny-light | grep .css$) dist/tiny-light.css
scripts.copy:dark: ncp dist/$(ls dist | grep tiny-dark | grep .css$) dist/tiny-dark.css
scripts.postformat: npm run tslint && npm run eslint
scripts.publish:prepare: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.dev: vd-dev build && node ./generate-themes && npm run clean:css && parcel scss/index.html
